front.title: •••Vigo (V)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to Coruscant. While present with Xizor, forfeit +2 and opponents spies may not deploy to same non-battleground site. Once per game, may use 1 Force to deploy a non-war room battleground planet site (or system) not already on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: One of Xizor's hand-picked lieutenants. Ascended as Black Sun agent from gangster to manager. Earned title of Vigo from old Tionese for 'nephew'.

pulls: Battleground planet site or system (except a war room)
